00032 #ifndef TMRM_HASH_H
00033 #define TMRM_HASH_H
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 #ifdef __cplusplus
00038 extern "C" {
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #include <stdlib.h>
00042 
00043 /* The hash implementation is taken from librdf. It may be replaced some day,
00044    but it's fine now... */
00045 
00046 /* public constructors */
00047 tmrm_hash* tmrm_hash_new(tmrm_subject_map_sphere *sms, const char *name);
00048 tmrm_hash* tmrm_hash_new_from_string(tmrm_subject_map_sphere *sms,
00049         const char *name, const char *string);
00050 tmrm_hash* tmrm_hash_new_from_array_of_strings(tmrm_subject_map_sphere *sms,
00051         const char *name, const char **array);
00052 
00053 /* public copy constructor */
00054 tmrm_hash* tmrm_hash_new_from_hash(tmrm_hash* old_hash);
00055 
00056 /* public destructor */
00057 void tmrm_hash_free(tmrm_hash *hash);
00058 
00059 /* public methods */
00060 
00061 /* retrieve the number of key/value pairs in the hash */
00062 int tmrm_hash_size(tmrm_hash* hash);
00063 
00064 /* retrieve one value for a given hash key */
00065 char* tmrm_hash_get(tmrm_hash* hash, const char *key);
00066 
00067 /* lookup a hash key and decode value as a boolean */
00068 int tmrm_hash_get_as_boolean(tmrm_hash* hash, const char *key);
00069 
00070 /* lookup a hash key and decode value as a long */
00071 long tmrm_hash_get_as_long(tmrm_hash* hash, const char *key);
00072 
00073 /* retrieve one value for key and delete from hash all other values */
00074 char* tmrm_hash_get_del(tmrm_hash* hash, const char *key);
00075 
00076 /* insert a key/value pair */
00077 int tmrm_hash_put_strings(tmrm_hash* hash, const char *key, const char *value);
00078 
00079 void tmrm_hash_print(tmrm_hash* hash, FILE *fh);
00080 void tmrm_hash_print_keys(tmrm_hash* hash, FILE *fh);
00081 void tmrm_hash_print_values(tmrm_hash* hash, const char *key_string, FILE *fh);
00082 
00083 #ifdef __cplusplus
00084 }
00085 #endif

00087 #endif
